languageKey.label: Specifies the address of the document to embed in the iFrame (Should start with "http://")
Use getData in this plugin options (fields above). Of example: "Before {page:uid} After" gets to "Before 123 After"
Specifies the width in pixels
Specifies the height in pixels
Specifies the name
Enables a set of extra restrictions for the content
Specifies that the iFrame should look like it is a part of the containing document
Specifies the HTML content of the page to show in the iFrame
Specifies whether or not to display scrollbars (Not supported in HTML5)
Specifies whether or not to display a border around an iframe (Not supported in HTML5)
Specifies a unique id for an element
Specifies one or more classnames for the element (refers to a class in a style sheet)
Specifies an inline style for the element
